title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of chain of pizzeria restaurants most often found in college towns in southern USA states. Serves pizzas, calzones, salads, and hoagies (with grilled tempeh, avocado, mushroom, and tofu options). Very few vegan choices but they do have vegan cheese. Theme is laid-back hippie.
